definition: of or relating to or characteristic of the subclass Branchiopoda, aquatic crustaceans typically having a carapace and many pairs of leaflike appendages used for swimming as well as respiration and feeding
details:
adjective
- of or relating to or characteristic of the subclass Branchiopoda
= synonyms: branchiopod
noun
- aquatic crustaceans typically having a carapace and many pairs of leaflike appendages used for swimming as well as respiration and feeding
= synonyms: branchiopod
